::KitKat::

She looked at Megatron, who looked like he was about to scrap her.  
She turned and looked at Drillbit.  She smiled at him.  "Put 
Airbomber outside. Just shove him outthere and hope they shoot him 
up.  He sin't of any use to us.  He knows nothing.  Just toss him out 
and forget him." 

She looked at Megatron.  She was afraid of him, and it was writen on 
her face.  BUt she would stand her ground.  "Commander, Phobis had 
said he had other weapons taht would aid us.  In trying to save 
Etchingar, who didn't make it, I retireved a highly specialized 
energon rifle.  Phobia has promised other weapons.  I....I was trying 
to get you more weapons Commander Megatron."
She waited for him to beat the armor of her.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit kept aim at AirBomber. He heard what Land Mine said.
> "Land Mine, I'm sorry, but Time Bomb id dead. I know, she died in my
> arms." He said, trying to set the bot streight, and to inform 
KitKat,
> who he just spoted.
